articles.description: Cruise line operator Carnival Corporation posted record revenue and its first quarterly profit since 2020 as bookings surged, but shares fell on a weaker-than-expected profit outlook.
articles.content:
• Carnival Corporation posted record revenue and its first quarterly profit since 2020, thanks to a surge in bookings as the post-pandemic travel boom continued unabated.
